Let me be a bit more verbose. I'm not convinced about it's use. When I'm within the ZeroNet net am I anonymous? If not then what's the point?  So I enable "Always enable TOR", so does that mean I am now anonymous? If so then why allow external links within post?
For example there's a link in this post:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:9901_1KbV1e1u6P6AsY8XNBydgtbtN8iSB5WMyG/Nigel+Farage+s+aide+and+his+dark+web+drug+money+laundering+scam

So basically I'm not convinced as of yet.
